Explore the future of luxury with AI innovation.Watch demoJun 19, 20240 min. readFacebookLinkedInTwitterEmailCopy to clipboardLike many industries, the jewelry world is experiencing massive leaps in innovation thanks to the application of artificial intelligence (AI) technology. AI is transforming every aspect of the industry, from jewelry design and production to how customers interact with it in the market, helping jewelry stores grow at a rapid pace. That’s why it’s important to understand current AI jewelry applications and the prevailing trends shaping the future of this luxury business.Brief Overview of the Jewelry IndustryJewelry comes in many forms and can vary widely in both the type (rings, bracelets, earrings, necklaces, etc.) and the materials used in its construction (precious metals, gemstones, wood, etc.). The jewelry industry has been valued at $70 billion U.S. dollars with the average customer spending over $130 U.S. dollars on jewelry annually.Introduction to AI and Its Growing InfluenceTraditionally, trades like jewelry making have been labor-intensive processes. The creativity in the design—as well as the quality of the finished product—were entirely dependent on the craftsman’s artistic expertise. However, in recent years, technological advancements such as AI have enabled machines to perform tasks that previously could only be completed by well-trained humans.With advanced processing and pattern recognition capabilities, AI can analyze large datasets in seconds and recognize trends or commonalities, then make predictions based on what patterns it sees. Additionally, AI can continually learn from its experiences, becoming more accurate over time thanks to machine learning algorithms. These skills can be widely applied in a variety of industries, which is why AI has grown so rapidly over the last few years.In the jewelry industry specifically, AI has greatly affected three key parts of the jewelry lifecycle: design, production, and sales.AI in Jewelry DesignBefore AI, jewelry designs were limited by the experience of the designer and the imagination of the customer. Now, thanks to AI jewelry software, the jewelry design process requires much less physical manipulation and less visualization on behalf of the customer.Personalized Designs and CustomizationOne of the most significant ways AI is being leveraged in the jewelry-making process is in the ideation phase. AI can quickly analyze customer preferences and compare that information to current industry trends and historical sales data to generate a unique design concept that’s tailored to a specific individual. The technology greatly reduces the amount of time needed to design jewelry and opens the door for greater customer participation and personalization during the design process, as AI can easily use keywords to generate different colors and styles.Virtual Try-On ExperiencesAI has also led to the birth of virtual try-on experiences which are completely changing the way consumers shop for jewelry online and in stores. Thanks to hyper-realistic AR technology, customers can see AI-generated images that demonstrate how the piece would look on them. This virtual test helps them feel more confident about committing to a certain bracelet or pair of earrings, and it also reduces the number of returns.Enhanced Creativity and Design PossibilitiesAI jewelry software is also boosting creativity. Jewelry designers are no longer limited by their own knowledge and experience. Using AI jewelry software, they can now enter design parameters and create multiple AI-generated concepts in less than half the time it would have taken to create concepts manually.Additionally, AI isn’t human, so sometimes it will generate shapes or textures that are unconventional. These accidental details can often be the springboard a jewelry designer needs to create never-before-seen designs that will help them stand out from other designers in the market.AI in Jewelry Production and Supply ChainAI jewelry design is just the beginning. Supply chains around the world are seeing dramatic decreases in operational costs and improved efficiency thanks to AI’s superior decision-making and analytical abilities. Globally, AI adoption has more than doubled since 2017, and the jewelry supply chain has not been a slow adopter. Here are just three ways advances in AI are impacting jewelry production and supply chain for the better:Streamlined Production ProcessesOptimization is one of the biggest benefits of jewelry AI.
